definition: end/extremity/item/port/to hold sth level with both hands/to carry/regular

sentences.english: The news will never get into print.
sentences.chinese: 這條消息永遠無法見諸報端。

sentences.english: At the same time, we see an endless number of reports about what a hard time college grads are having finding a job.
sentences.chinese: 與此，關於大學生就業難的報道屢見報端，數之不盡。

sentences.english: Some cases of cholera have already been reported.
sentences.chinese: 幾個霍亂病例已經見諸報端。
